text: Trump Leads Biden in Nearly Every Battleground State, New Poll Finds  —  Voters in battleground states said they trusted Donald J. Trump over President Biden on the economy, foreign policy and immigration, as Mr. Biden's multiracial base shows signs of fraying.

Trump and allies plot revenge, Justice Department control in a second term  —  Advisers have also discussed deploying the military to quell potential unrest on Inauguration Day.  Critics have called the ideas under consideration dangerous and unconstitutional.

The 2024 Election Rematch Americans Are Dreading Looks Likely  —  One year before voting, a weakened Biden and a criminally indicted Trump appear to be on a collision course  —  A year before the 2024 election, a divided nation is stuck in a political loop: President Trump's weaknesses …

If Trump wins, more voters foresee better finances, staying out of war — CBS News poll  —  With views of things in America continuing to be bad and now hitting their most negative marks of the year, one might expect an incumbent president to trail in a pre-election poll — as Joe Biden does in this one.

Blinken made an unannounced visit on Sunday to the Israeli-occupied West Bank …

Netanyahu backed down from firing minister who called to nuke Gaza  —  The far-right lawmaker later said on X that ‘any sensible person’ knew the comments that Israel could use a nuclear weapon in the Gaza Strip were ‘metaphorical.’  —  Heritage Minister Amichai Eliyahu from Otzma Yehudit …

Stephanopoulos presses Scalise on whether 2020 election was stolen: ‘Yes or no?’  —  House Majority Leader Steve Scalise (R-La.) refused to answer whether the 2020 election was stolen when pressed eight separate times in a Sunday interview with ABC News's George Stephanopoulos.

Iowa Gov. Kim Reynolds to endorse Ron DeSantis for president at Monday rally in Des Moines  —  Gov. Kim Reynolds' decision to endorse Ron DeSantis is likely to anger Donald Trump, who has already accused Reynolds of being insufficiently loyal.  —  After months of quietly signaling her support …

Sen. John Fetterman swipes at California Gov. Gavin Newsom  —  During a speech in Iowa, Fetterman said Newsom is “running for president right now” but doesn't have the “guts to announce it.”  —  ALTOONA, IA — Sen. John Fetterman, D-Pa., on Saturday evening criticized California Gov. Gavin Newsom …

Virginia's Youngkin says Biden is ‘legitimately elected president’  —  Virginia Gov. Glenn Youngkin (R) on Sunday acknowledged President Biden was “legitimately elected president” as Republicans continue to be peppered with questions about whether the 2020 election was legitimate.

House Speaker Mike Johnson Skirts Question on Personal Bank Account  —  The newfound Speaker said he was a “man of modest means” in a Fox interview.  —  House Speaker Mike Johnson (R-LA) responded on Sunday to a report by The Daily Beast that highlighted his apparent lack of a bank account on his financial disclosure.

Trump 2.0: The climate cannot survive another Trump term  —  This op-ed is part of a series exploring what a second term would look like for either President Biden or former President Trump.  —  Back in the home stretch of the 2020 presidential election, I stated that a second Trump term would be “game over for the climate.”
